class.name: Skeleton
class.brief_description: Skeleton for characters and animated objects.
class.description: Skeleton provides a hierarchical interface for managing bones, including pose, rest and animation (see [Animation]). Skeleton will support rag doll dynamics in the future.

method.name: add_bone
method.description: Add a bone, with name "name". [method get_bone_count] will become the bone index.

method.name: clear_bones
method.description: Clear all the bones in this skeleton.

method.name: find_bone
method.description: Return the bone index that matches "name" as its name.

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Return the amount of bones in the skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Return the name of the bone at index "index"

method.name: get_bone_parent
method.description: Return the bone index which is the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note that the parent bone returned will always be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_rest
method.description: Return the rest transform for a bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_parent
method.description: Set the bone index "parent_idx" as the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note: "parent_idx" must be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_rest
method.description: Set the rest transform for bone "bone_idx"
